about_the_game:
In a world brimming with magic where customers demand everything from legendary swords to questionably glowing potions, YOU are the shopkeeper destined to make it all happen. Craft, create, and charm your way through the chaos—or relax with a little cozy shopkeeping magic.

Key Features:

● Brew magical potions: Stir bubbling cauldrons, mix rare ingredients, and hope you don’t turn the customer purple (unless they wanted that).

● Forge epic weapons: Smelt, pour, hammer, repeat—create blades worthy of heroes, villains, and picky wizards.

● Craft unique trinkets: Tinker with magical oddities to satisfy your shop’s strangest clientele. ● Choose your vibe: Dive into fast-paced Challenge Mode (timed chaos) or take it slow with Cozy Mode—no stress, just magical success.

● Unlock new possibilities: Pass levels to upgrade your shop, unlock new recipes, and discover rare ingredients to perfect your craft.

● Venture further: Master Challenge or Cozy mode to unlock Survival Mode (how long can you keep up?) and Zen Mode (shopkeeping bliss, no timers attached).

Your shop, your rules, your legacy. Will you rise to shopkeeping greatness, or get buried under a mountain of potion orders?

Put on your apron, light up the forge, and let the magic begin!

Share your feedback/suggestions, report bugs, and support our journey by joining our Discord server:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 Series / AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 3S

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
